decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Block Plan; TP/235/01; TP/235/02. Received: 07/11/2016.
TP/235/03 REV: B; TP/235/04 REV: A; TP/235/05 REV: A. Received: 01/12/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  flank walls of the front extension or detached outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 25 Maswell Park Crescent, Hounslow, TW3 2DR, and not as primary residential accommodation or for business purposes, nor shall any bathroom or kitchen facilities be installed into the outbuilding without the permission of the Local Planning Authority obtained through the submission of a planning application.
description: Erection of a single storey front extension incorporating conversion of a garage into habitable room, installation of a front roof window and erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden
